mapper.insert: insert into board_reply_tb (user_id, board_id, content) values (#{userId}, #{boardId}, #{content})
mapper.select: select br.id, br.content, br.user_id, br.board_id, br.created_at, u.username from board_reply_tb as br left join user_tb as u on br.user_id = u.id where board_id = #{boardId}
